properties.name: aws.access.key.id
properties.description: AWS Access Key ID for S3 authentication

properties.name: aws.access.key.secret
properties.description: AWS Secret Access Key for S3 authentication

properties.name: aws.region
properties.description: AWS region where the S3 bucket is located

properties.name: aws.s3.bucket
properties.description: Name of the S3 bucket to be used for file storage
